org.apache.beam.sdk.state

Interface State

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BagState<T>, CombiningState<InputT,AccumT,OutputT>, GroupingState<InputT,OutputT>, MapState<K,V>, SetState<T>, ValueState<T>, WatermarkHoldState

    @Experimental(value=STATE)
public interface State
    A state cell, supporting a clear() operation.

    Specific types of state add appropriate accessors for reading and writing values, see ValueState, BagState, and GroupingState.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear out the state location.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clear out the state location.
